product.description: Medimix Ayurvedic Soap Contains an exclusive blend of the purest and premium grade vegetable glycerine and the time tested Ayurvedic formulation of Lakshadi oil. Successfully moisturizes dry skin making it soft and supple, and helps decrease itches and cracks caused by dryness.

top_reviews.title: Don't buy it. It's not original medimix.
top_reviews.body: This is clearly not the original medimix soap, just someone benefitting from using their name for poor quality soaps.  It doesn't look like original. Colour is faded. It doesn't smell like original. It doesn't work like original.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
This is clearly not the original medimix soap, just someone benefitting from using their name for poor quality soaps.

It doesn't look like original. Colour is faded.
It doesn't smell like original.
It doesn't work like original.
Read more

top_reviews.title: Quality has gone very bad
top_reviews.body: I have been using medimix from almost 15+ years.The quality has gone really bad off late, the pure herbal smell, dominated by notes of citronella, seems to have totally disappeared. Smells more like a 501 bar soap nowadays. They spoilt their brand totally, due to cost cutting,and using more of synthetic chemicals, i guess.No more medimix for me!Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have been using medimix from almost 15+ years.The quality has gone really bad off late, the pure herbal smell, dominated by notes of citronella, seems to have totally disappeared. Smells more like a 501 bar soap nowadays.
They spoilt their brand totally, due to cost cutting,and using more of synthetic chemicals, i guess.No more medimix for me!
Read more

top_reviews.title: Will Buy It Again
top_reviews.body: I have used Medimix in the past but not very frequently. I found the Buy 4 Get 1 Free offer on Amazon very attractive and I thought to buy it.  Skin feels very clean after use. And after using it a couple of times I noticed that the pimple scars on my face began to fade away. My skin became slightly fairer after use as well. Another thing that I really liked is that the soap didn’t dry out my skin after using it frequently.  Smell wise it is nice a strong herbal scent. Though I would say Chandrika’s scent is a bit stronger. Medimix still manages to fill the bathroom with its scent though.  I will be buying it again for sure. And I would definitely recommend to use it.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I have used Medimix in the past but not very frequently. I found the Buy 4 Get 1 Free offer on Amazon very attractive and I thought to buy it.

Skin feels very clean after use. And after using it a couple of times I noticed that the pimple scars on my face began to fade away. My skin became slightly fairer after use as well. Another thing that I really liked is that the soap didn’t dry out my skin after using it frequently.

Smell wise it is nice a strong herbal scent. Though I would say Chandrika’s scent is a bit stronger. Medimix still manages to fill the bathroom with its scent though.

I will be buying it again for sure. And I would definitely recommend to use it.
Read more

top_reviews.title: It's Detergent in the form of a Soap
top_reviews.body: I don't know why this product has 4 rating I mean are we that much price sensitive that we are okay in using a detergent type soap on our body, Seriously. It is not a Value for money product by miles For a product to become value for money the product has to hold some value in terms of quality with respect to the Price and Medimix doesn't hold any value in terms of quality. Even 5 for ₹50 doesn't make it a Value for money product.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
I don't know why this product has 4 rating I mean are we that much price sensitive that we are okay in using a detergent type soap on our body, Seriously. It is not a Value for money product by miles For a product to become value for money the product has to hold some value in terms of quality with respect to the Price and Medimix doesn't hold any value in terms of quality. Even 5 for ₹50 doesn't make it a Value for money product.

top_reviews.title: Great herbal soap with actual herbs
top_reviews.body: Okay guys so about this medimix soap, so first of all of u want a great fragrance and scented soap for your body then you should go for other brands because medimix is more of a herbal soap Though it doesn't has a very great aroma but it's very beneficial than those scented soaps. It keeps your skin smooth and moisturized and protect it from drying. If u have any pimples/itchiness/our any fungus related infection on your skin thne this soap is best for you.  Yes it is herbal but it doesn't smells like medicine.  It smells good, and yes though this is not scented soap but it prevents your sweats from giving bad smells through your body.  I have been using it since 2014 and till date I haven't got a single pimple or any other fungal desease on my body.  P.S.: you can use it for every corner of your body ( from your forehead to toe).Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
Okay guys so about this medimix soap, so first of all of u want a great fragrance and scented soap for your body then you should go for other brands because medimix is more of a herbal soap
Though it doesn't has a very great aroma but it's very beneficial than those scented soaps.
It keeps your skin smooth and moisturized and protect it from drying.
If u have any pimples/itchiness/our any fungus related infection on your skin thne this soap is best for you.

Yes it is herbal but it doesn't smells like medicine.

It smells good, and yes though this is not scented soap but it prevents your sweats from giving bad smells through your body.

I have been using it since 2014 and till date I haven't got a single pimple or any other fungal desease on my body.

P.S.: you can use it for every corner of your body ( from your forehead to toe).
Read more

top_reviews.title: Not for dry skin .
top_reviews.body: If you have a dry skin please don't buy it . It made my skin super dry and flacky after use and I had to apply multiple layers of moisturizer to soothe the irritated skin.Read more
top_reviews.body_html:
If you have a dry skin please don't buy it . It made my skin super dry and flacky after use and I had to apply multiple layers of moisturizer to soothe the irritated skin.
